tweet.text: RT @FSIatState: Congratulations to the newly confirmed Secretary of State Antony Blinken. #FSI looks forward to working with you to continu…
tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Congratulations to the newly confirmed Secretary of State Antony Blinken. #FSI looks forward to working with you to continue to provide our foreign affairs professionals world-class diplomatic training and the necessary skills to advance U.S. foreign policy priorities!
